articles.author: Michail
articles.title: Xiaomi 13 Ultra launches in Hong Kong, Europe to follow on June 12 - GSMArena.com
articles.description: We'll finally get pricing and availability for the 13 Ultra in Europe next week. As expected, Xiaomi launched its Xiaomi 13 Ultra in Hong Kong today,...
articles.content: As expected, Xiaomi launched its Xiaomi 13 Ultra in Hong Kong today, marking the first international launch of the device since its announcement in China back in April. Xiaomi 13 Ultra is available i… [+654 chars]
